product_name: ExOfficio Air Strip Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A classic shirt for travel, hiking or any active endeavor, the lightweight ExOfficio Air Strip men's shirt offers a wrinkle-resistant, sun-protective fabric with lots of ventilation to keep you cool. Nylon/polyester blend resists wrinkles, wicks moisture off of skin and dries quickly. Integrated air strip ventilation system on back yoke and side seams allows cooling airflow. Offers very good protection from the sun: Ultraviolet Protection Factor (UPF) of 30. Three-position sun collar shades your neck from the sun's searing rays. Sleeves roll up and secure with button-closure tabs. Front chest pockets with rip-and-stick closures stow trail items; zippered security pocket under right chest pocket holds small valuables. Closeout.
short_description: A classic shirt for travel, hiking or any active endeavor, the lightweight ExOfficio Air Strip men's shirt offers a wrinkle-resistant, sun-protective fabric with lots of ventilation to keep you cool.
